parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: Workspace numeric identifier. When omitted, checkpoints are listed in the user context.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Free-text search filter to match against checkpoint `name`. Supports keyword filters for `status`, `before`, and `after` (checkpoint saved date).

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default: `50`.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination. Default: `0`.
